entries.journal_entry_description: Surveyor Keslev has asked you to find and activate the various miner markers which are located around the central volcano.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Locate the marker near the entrance of the kubaza beetle cavern and activate it.
entries.task02_message_box_text: This cavern was originally built by the seperatists during their excavation of the Old Republic cruiser. After they left, it became a hive for kubaza beetles, hence the name. WARNING: The cavern was closed by order of Milo Mensix after a field crew of miners was lost to the beetles while surveying the cavern.
entries.task03_item_name: Old Republic Cruiser crash site marker found.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Locate the marker near the Old Republic Cruiser crash site and activate it.
entries.task03_journal_entry_title: Old Republic Cruiser Crash Site Marker
entries.task04_message_box_text: The remains of this cruiser were excavated during the Clone Wars by the seperatists. After a brief period where they had sealed the area off, the seperatists left the area and began work on their new factory. Warning: Salvage Bandits have moved into this region and have begun dismantling the ship. They are highly dangerous and will kill on sight.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Locate the marker near the main lava flow and activate it.
entries.task06_message_box_text: The central volcano deposits close to 20,000 gallons of lava per second into the lava pools below. Unfortunately, this volcano's deposits are rather poor in usable resources. This is why the majority of the mining operations are in the higher grounds to the south.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: There are three markers located around the central volcano, located to the north of the Mensix Mining Facility. Surveyor Keslev has asked you to find all three of them and check the information on them.
entries.task07_task_display_string_2: Old Republic Cruiser Crash Site Marker
